dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, 71.3 billion tenge? Are you serious right now?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, seventy one point three billion tenge? Are you serious right now?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The total cost of the project is 71.3 billion tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, Host_A. It's, um, for a new hematology center in Ust-Kamenogorsk.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, Host_A. It's, um, for a new hematology center in Ust-Kamenogorsk.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A hematology center will be built in Ust-Kamenogorsk.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, but it's not just a hospital. It's got bone marrow transplants, like, advanced stuff.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, but it's not just a hospital. It's got bone marrow transplants, like, advanced stuff.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the main building, laboratories, departments of radiation diagnostics, cardiology, cardiac surgery, hematology, bone marrow transplantation and complex somatics will be equipped with modern medical equipment.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: For 71.3 billion. Wow. What, like, golden stethoscopes?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For seventy one point three billion. Wow. What, like, golden stethoscopes?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It’s going to have 148 beds in the hospital, and, get this, a 24-bed hotel for patients, too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's going to have one hundred forty eight beds in the hospital, and, get this, a twenty four-bed hotel for patients, too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The medical institution is planned to have 2 buildings: a hospital for 148 people and a hotel for patients of the clinic with 24 beds.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A hotel? Is this a medical facility or, like, a spa resort for the well-connected?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A hotel? Is this a medical facility or, like, a spa resort for the well-connected?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, no, it’s for patients who need long-term care or travel for treatment, you know? It's really modern.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no, it's for patients who need long-term care or travel for treatment, you know? It's really modern.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And how complete is this medical miracle, really? Like, on paper?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And how complete is this medical miracle, really? Like, on paper?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's 78% complete. The frame's up, exterior utilities connected, roof, facade done.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's seventy eight percent complete. The frame's up, exterior utilities connected, roof, facade done.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: To date, the facility is 78% complete. The frame has been erected, external utility networks have been connected, the roof, facade, window units have been prepared, and the interior decoration has been partially completed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, almost there. For all that money.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, almost there. For all that money.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But it means people will have access to advanced methods, Host_A. Cardiology, cardiac surgery, um, complex somatics.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But it means people will have access to advanced methods, Host_A. Cardiology, cardiac surgery, um, complex somatics.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the main building, laboratories, departments of radiation diagnostics, cardiology, cardiac surgery, hematology, bone marrow transplantation and complex somatics will be equipped with modern medical equipment. The new center will provide patients with access to advanced methods of treatment and rehabilitation," the government said in a statement.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, yeah, I'm sure it'll change lives. For about five minutes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, yeah, I'm sure it'll change lives. For about five minutes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, but the Head of State actually ordered this. It’s a huge, important investment.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, but the Head of State actually ordered this. It's a huge, important investment.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The corresponding order was given by the Head of State.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Mmm-hmm. A huge, important investment. For... something.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mmm-hmm. A huge, important investment. For... something.
